The Cloister Races allowed the strands of cellular transmutation to remain alive within the biological gene pool. The 3 Seedings: The Amenti Rescue Mission failed twice due to Interstellar Wars over humanity's right to evolve on Earth. The Palaidorians, Ur-Tarranates & other guardian races of Tara, HU-2 and HU-3 had to re-seed all but the first and second Root and Cloister Races 3 different times. The present human lineage is part of the 3 rd Seeding. Present day humans are primarily of the 5th Root Race Aryan and Hibiru Cloister Race strains. Some members of the 6th Cloister Race, the Melchizedeks, are also present on Earth and 150,000 7th Race Paradisian souls, the Indigo Children, will be incarnating on Earth between 1999 - 2017 to accelerate the genetic evolution of the races and to help Earth shift to the Bridge Zone time continuum. The Arc of the Covenant is a time portal passage between Earth and the Andromeda galaxy that was created 840,000 years ago by guardian races. I was used to store and protect the Sphere of Amenti until the Sphere could be returned to Earth's core.
